biotools.summary: The BION-2 web server predicts non-specifically surface-bound ions. Ions are essential component of the cell and frequently are found bound to various macromolecules, in particular to proteins. A binding of an ion to a protein greatly affects proteins biophysical characteristics and needs to be taken into account in any modeling approach.
